resources.string: The Galloway is one of the longest beef cattle breeds in the world, named after the Galloway region of Scotland, where it originated, in the 17th century.
Hereford cattle are a type of beef cattle originating from areas with a subtropical climate."
Cachena is a dual purpose breed of cattle from Portugal and Galicia, Spain. In Portugal, there is also a similar but larger breed of cattle known as Barrosão or Barrosã
The Aberdeen Angus, sometimes just Angus, is a small Scottish breed of beef cattle. It comes from native cattle from the counties of Aberdeen, Banff, Kincardine and Forfar in northeastern Scotland.

a type of horse race originating from the Arab region, kept by people for various purposes. Because of its high posture, special performance, namely excellent body resistance, intelligence, agility, Arabian horses were also used for war.

The Appaloosa is an American horse breed that is best known for its colorful coat patterns. There is a wide variety of body types within the breed, stemming from the influence of several horse breeds throughout its history.

The Dutch Warmblood is a warm-blooded horse breed registered with the Koninklijk Warmbloed Paardenstamboek Nederland, which regulates the breeding of competition and jumping horses, as well as racehorses and racehorses.
The Mustang is a free-roaming horse in the Western United States, descended from horses brought to America by the Spanish. Mustang is often referred to as a wild horse
Murrah buffalo is a type of buffalo that is kept mainly for milk production. It originates from Haryana and Punjab in India
The Carabao is a domestic marsh-type buffalo native to the Philippines. Carabao was introduced to Guam from Spanish Philippines in the 17th century
The Italian Mediterranean buffalo is a breed of Italian buffalo. This buffalo is a type of river buffalo and is similar to the type of buffalo in Hungary, Romania and the Balkan countries.

Nagpuri is a breed of buffalo that originates from Maharashtra, India. It stands out better among the buffalo breeds that combine milk quality and drought in better proportions under adverse climatic conditions.
Surti is a breed of buffalo found in the Kaira and Vadodara districts of Gujarat between the Mahi and Sabarmati rivers. The average milk production is 1600–1800 liters
Holstein cow or Frisia is one of the dairy cattle breeds which is now known as the cow that produces the most milk in dairy farms.
